set(CMAKE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)

FetchContent_Declare(
  fmt
  GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/fmtlib/fmt
  GIT_SHALLOW 1
  GIT_TAG 8.0.1
)

FetchContent_MakeAvailable(fmt)

mark_as_advanced(
  FMT_CUDA_TEST
  FMT_DEBUG_POSTFIX
  FMT_DOC
  FMT_FUZZ
  FMT_INC_DIR
  FMT_INSTALL
  FMT_MODULE
  FMT_OS
  FMT_PEDANTIC
  FMT_TEST
  FMT_WERROR
)

mark_as_advanced(
  FETCHCONTENT_SOURCE_DIR_FMT
  FETCHCONTENT_UPDATES_DISCONNECTED_FMT
)
